function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Failure to validate the integrity of the encrypted file","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of health data fluidity exposes vulnerability to pandemics like covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Insecure storage of sensitive medical data on distributed p2p file storage system.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of openpgp for generating and managing pgp keys for patients’ medical data.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Global spread of covid-19 with millions infected from over 185 countries/regions.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"High mortality rate with over 200,000 deceased from covid-19.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Unhygienic conditions in wet markets","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Global circulation of sars-cov-2","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inability to accommodate increasing covid-19 cases in hospitals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"54% compliance with quarantine measures","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Emotional and psychological issues associated with quarantine periods","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Ineffective and unsustainable mitigation strategies in western societies","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Vulnerable populations such as the elderly and individuals with comorbidities are at risk of severe impacts from covid-19 due to physical inactivity during quarantine and social isolation.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity levels and increased sedentary time during quarantine and social isolation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of research on the relationship between quarantine/social isolation and deliberate physical activities within the home environment.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential increase in stress, depression, and anxiety due to social distancing and quarantine measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Potential lack of access to mental health resources and support services for individuals affected by quarantine and social distancing measures.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Risk of misinformation and negative effects on mental health from excessive exposure to covid-19 related news and media.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Covid-19 outbreak impaired individuals’ mental health resulting in anxiety, stress, and depression","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Ambiguity and limited information about covid-19, media influences, and increased perception of harm to physical, social, and financial health","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Prevalence of psychological disorders dependent on the number of infected individuals and location","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Younger people vulnerable to mental health issues due to enhanced access to social media information and stress from online education.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on sleep quality during covid-19 outbreak, with a link to mental health issues.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Methodological limitations in previous studies, including non-representative sample selection and underrepresentation of certain demographics.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate physical activity leading to poor physical and mental health","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"High prevalence of anxiety and depression during quarantine","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of control group in previous study","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of examination of physiological and psychological mechanisms","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inability to identify chronic effects of exergames","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of standardized exergame protocols","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited scientific work and research on exergame interventions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of standardized timing for assessment of anxiety levels post-exergame sessions","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of leisure time physical activity","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Activity restriction during covid-19 pandemic","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Limited support for the idea that physical activity helps reduce disease severity","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate guidance for home-based exercises during confinement","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inconsistent recommendations for older individuals regarding exercise programs","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Increased sedentary time due to covid-19 quarantine","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Decreased physical activity during covid-19 quarantine","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Risk of exceeding sedentary screen time recommendations","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Restricted spaces for aerobic exercise","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Engagement in heavy aerobic and resistance training programs without adaptation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Participating in physical activity during a systemic viral infection","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inactivity due to quarantine and social isolation","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity diversity","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Uncontrolled progression in exercise intensity","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of physical activity due to quarantine and social isolation.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Overexertion and injury from improper exercise technique or excessive activity.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Lack of motivation to engage in regular exercise due to social isolation and quarantine.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Contagious transmission of the novel sars-cov-2 coronavirus from animal species to humans","category":"Society","confidence":"High"}]}
